summary: This document contains an email exchange between Lisa D Hurd and Amanda Kirby regarding mutual funds and account positions related to Southern Financial. It highlights internal communications within Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. concerning financial operations.

persons.name: Lisa D Hurd
persons.context: Lisa D Hurd is involved in the operations of Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. and is responsible for posting mutual funds.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is communicating with Lisa D Hurd about account positions and mutual funds related to Southern Financial.

keyFacts: The email exchange is dated October 21, 2013.
Lisa D Hurd mentions needing to manually post mutual funds the following day.
Amanda Kirby inquires about account positions related to Southern Financial.
The communication is marked as confidential and for internal use only.
